code: import React from'react';import{Card,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{LinkContainer}from'react-router-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Rating from'./Rating';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RoomCard=props=>{const{_id,images,name,pricePerNight,ratings}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"card-room",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:images[0].image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/room/${_id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"h4",children:name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h5",className:"mt-2 mb-2",children:["$",pricePerNight," / Per Night"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{reviews:ratings}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkContainer,{to:`/room/${_id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"w-100",variant:"primary",children:"View Details"})})]})]});};export default RoomCard;
